name: Our Clash of Clans
tagline: This is Offical Page from Supercell Where you can know About anything.Page Edited by Clasher Shadin.
body:
#Our Clash of Clans

Our new genration the most populer game Clash of Clans.

![](https://z-1-scontent-sea1-1.xx.fbcdn.net/hphotos-xtf1/v/t1.0-9/fr/cp0/e15/q65/12654447_575341359281109_2553721042076231138_n.jpg?efg=eyJpIjoiYiJ9&oh=15006718a8954a13728e6df744e67468&oe=5766689F)

**Clash Basic**

##Build and Defend

![](https://clashofclans.com/uploaded-images/_320x200_crop_center-center_90/01_01.jpg?mtime=20151020161912)

**Building a Village**

Use resources to construct buildings, walls and defenses to repel enemies and protect your hard-earned loot.

![](https://clashofclans.com/uploaded-images/_320x200_crop_center-center_90/01_02.jpg?mtime=20151020161956)

**Designing Your Base**

Master the art of the layout to protect your Town Hall, trophies and resources from enemy attackers.

![](https://clashofclans.com/uploaded-images/_320x200_crop_center-center_90/01_03.jpg?mtime=20151020162017)

**Defending Your Turf**

Upgrade defenses, walls and traps to make the best base in the game.



**Strategy**

##Up your game

![](https://clashofclans.com/uploaded-images/_320x320_crop_center-center_90/December_Audit_3.jpg?mtime=20160112121003)

[Th11 Mass witch Strategy Guide](https://youtube.com/watch?v=0NzGJqdC-1A)

**by Clash With Ash**

![](https://clashofclans.com/uploaded-images/_320x320_crop_center-center_90/0006_Videos.jpg?mtime=20151027105127)

[Raid the village (Inferno tower power!)](https://m.youtube.com/watch?v=qe236wGvsZ4)

**by Godson**


###About


This page is offical from Supercell Clash of Clans is a 2012 freemium mobile MMO strategy video game developed and published by Supercell, a video game company based in Helsinki, Finland. The game was released for iOS platforms on August 2, 2012. You can post about Clash of Clans. If you have any problem than feedback at
 clashofclans.feedback@supercell.com








[Supercell](https://supercell.com/) | [Clash of Clans](https://clashofclans.com/) | [Our Clash of Clans](https://mobile.facebook.com/Our-Clash-of-Clans-573627812785797/?refid=17) | [Privacy Policy](http://supercell.com/en/privacy-policy/)
